title: Cheaters.
text:
Do not play the higher level tables. The physics of the game will change. 
1. The cueball will get sucked straight into a pocket
2. You barely have the break 
2. You will rarely pot a ball on break
3. If you do get a ball on break the cueball will be stuck behind a different one which is almost always impossible to get out of to continue your turn 
4. If 1 thru 3 didn‚Äôt happen then a target ball will just bounce side to side in front of a pocket even if the shot is clear as day

I can play the lower tables all day without these happening often let alone 6+ games in a row. The game favors people from certain countries and they play seamlessly. Check the world leaderboards and see what countries are favored.

title: Full of bots, but still fun if you don‚Äôt care about winning
text: This is just like all miniclip games. Money grab by the publishers (and Apple), but no true, actual humans as competition. As frustrating as it is, I‚Äôm going to keep playing this for free because it is a fun game, but I‚Äôm doing so with no expectations of advancing in any way because the game is completely rigged. Here‚Äôs my advice: play the game and expect to start losing when your record is too good. Just don‚Äôt spend a dime on this scam because it won‚Äôt change the enjoyability factor at all.
